name: Democratization Policy Council
goal: DPC is a global initiative for accountability in democracy promotion.  The institutional aim is to inform the public about the impact of the policies of democracies on efforts to establish or consolidate democratic process worldwide.
interests: Energy, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy
euInitiatives: DPC assesses EU policies in relation to its mission, particularly in terms of enlargement, where the EU has the most leverage.  DPC has paid particular attention to EU policies in the Western Balkans, but is also following the Eastern Neighborhood - Ukraine in particular. Recently DPC has started to deal with more General issues of EU foreign and security policy and the EU's policy on refugees, asylum seekers and migrants.
